title: Grocery List
body: Milk, Bread, Eggs, Cheese, and Apples.

title: Meeting Prep
body: Review the Q3 performance report before the 10 AM meeting.

title: Book to Read
body: Someone recommended 'The Midnight Library' by Matt Haig.

title: Birthday Gift Idea
body: Get a new cookbook for Mom's birthday next month.

title: Workout Plan
body: Monday: Chest, Wednesday: Back, Friday: Legs. Don't forget cardio.

title: Project Deadline
body: The final draft for the Phoenix project is due this Friday.

title: Movie Night
body: Watch the new sci-fi movie that just came out on the streaming service.

title: Language Learning
body: Practice Spanish vocabulary for 15 minutes. Use the flashcard app.

title: Inspiration
body: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

title: Car Maintenance
body: Schedule an oil change. The car is due for service.
